title: Writting VBA code to successfully create a powerpoint presentation
original_prompt: You are a programmer and you need to make a PowerPoint presentation. You must do it using the VBA programming language. Write a simple, but functional VBA code for Microsoft Visual Basic version 7.1, to successfully create a 6 slide powerpoint presentation.  Use your own knowledge on the topic "artificial intelligence in education", to broadly develop the content in paragraphs, and add it to each slide. You have to use Conditional structure "case". Each slide must have a title and the paragraph of content. You have to use the Shapes.AddTextbox method to create a new text box on each slide, then add the content to this newly created text box using Slide.Shapes(2).TextFrame.TextRange.Text. Do not include images. Do not use placeholders. Do not use bullet points. Do not use Shapes.Title.TextFrame.TextRange.Text. Do not save the presentation. Don't close PowerPoint. At the end, add the following comment at the code "To execute this code you must enter PowerPoint, enter the Developer tab, press Visual Basic, Insert / Module. Paste the code and run it".

Sub CreateAIPresentation()  
    Dim pptApp As Object  
    Dim pptPres As Object  
    Dim slideIndex As Integer  
    Dim slideTitle As String  
    Dim slideContent As String  
    Set pptApp = CreateObject("PowerPoint.Application")  
    Set pptPres = pptApp.Presentations.Add  
    For slideIndex = 1 To 6  
        Select Case slideIndex  
            Case 1  
                slideTitle = "Introduction to AI in Education"  
                slideContent = "Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the educational landscape by providing personalized learning experiences, automating administrative tasks, and enhancing student engagement."  
            Case 2  
                slideTitle = "Personalized Learning"  
                slideContent = "AI enables personalized learning by analyzing student data and adapting educational content to meet individual needs, thereby improving learning outcomes."  
            Case 3  
                slideTitle = "Automation of Administrative Tasks"  
                slideContent = "AI can automate various administrative tasks such as grading, scheduling, and managing student records, allowing educators to focus more on teaching."  
            Case 4  
                slideTitle = "Enhancing Student Engagement"  
                slideContent = "Through interactive tools and intelligent tutoring systems, AI enhances student engagement by making learning more interactive and enjoyable."  
            Case 5  
                slideTitle = "Challenges of AI in Education"  
                slideContent = "Despite its benefits, the integration of AI in education faces challenges such as data privacy concerns, the need for teacher training, and the potential for bias in AI algorithms."  
            Case 6  
                slideTitle = "The Future of AI in Education"  
                slideContent = "The future of AI in education looks promising, with ongoing advancements that could further personalize learning and improve educational outcomes for all students."  
        End Select  
        With pptPres.Slides.Add(slideIndex, ppLayoutText)  
            .Shapes.AddTextbox(msoTextOrientationHorizontal, 100, 100, 500, 300).TextFrame.TextRange.Text = slideTitle  
            .Shapes.AddTextbox(msoTextOrientationHorizontal, 100, 150, 500, 300).TextFrame.TextRange.Text = slideContent  
        End With  
    Next slideIndex  
End Sub  
'To execute this code you must enter PowerPoint, enter the Developer tab, press Visual Basic, Insert / Module. Paste the code and run it

Sub CreateAIPresentation()

            Case 5  
                slideTitle = "Challenges of AI in Education"  
                slideContent = "Despite its benefits, the integration of AI in education faces challenges such as data privacy concerns, the need for teacher training, and the potential for bias in AI algorithms."  
            Case 6  
                slideTitle = "The Future of AI in Education"  
                slideContent = "The future of AI in education looks promising, with ongoing advancements that could further personalize learning and improve educational outcomes for all students."  
        End Select  
        
        With pptPres.Slides.Add(slideIndex, ppLayoutText)  
            .Shapes.AddTextbox(msoTextOrientationHorizontal, 100, 100, 500, 50).TextFrame.TextRange.Text = slideTitle
